shortDescription: Command injection vulnerability found in Tenda G103 v.1.0.0.5 allows attacker to execute arbitrary code via a the language parameter.
vulnerabilityName: Tenda g103_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
